data.message: Here we go again, you haters out there, your mama never taught you right. Can’t say nothing nice, don’t even get on Facebook! F off all of you haters Eminem, I will love you forever.

replies.message: You just told people to fuck off right after u said don't say anything if u can't say something nice...so does that mean ur momma didn't raise u right 🤔

You gotta be stupid talking about say nice shit..listen closely to any Eminem song and tell a story about all the nice shit he says about his mom his ex his dad and whoever else his bitter ass is hating on for his next song
